Docs.summary: Provides convenience methods for creating instances of and with pre-configured defaults.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder CreateDefaultBuilder ();
.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder CreateDefaultBuilder() cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateDefaultBuilder () As IWebHostBuilder
public: static Microsoft::AspNetCore::Hosting::IWebHostBuilder ^ CreateDefaultBuilder();
static member CreateDefaultBuilder : unit -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with pre-configured defaults.
Docs.remarks: The following defaults are applied to the returned : use Kestrel as the web server and configure it using the application's configuration providers, set the to the result of , load from 'appsettings.json' and 'appsettings.[].json', load from User Secrets when is 'Development' using the entry assembly, load from environment variables, configure the to log to the console and debug output, adds the HostFiltering middleware, adds the ForwardedHeaders middleware if ASPNETCORE_FORWARDEDHEADERS_ENABLED=true, and enable IIS integration.

public: static Microsoft::AspNetCore::Hosting::IWebHostBuilder ^ CreateDefaultBuilder(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ args);
static member CreateDefaultBuilder : string[] -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostBuilder

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with pre-configured defaults.
Docs.remarks: The following defaults are applied to the returned : use Kestrel as the web server and configure it using the application's configuration providers, set the to the result of , load from 'appsettings.json' and 'appsettings.[].json', load from User Secrets when is 'Development' using the entry assembly, load from environment variables, load from supplied command line args, configure the to log to the console and debug output, configure the to map static web assets when is 'Development' using the entry assembly, adds the HostFiltering middleware, adds the ForwardedHeaders middleware if ASPNETCORE_FORWARDEDHEADERS_ENABLED=true, and enable IIS integration.

Docs.typeparam: The type containing the startup methods for the application.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with pre-configured defaults using typed Startup.
Docs.remarks: The following defaults are applied to the returned : use Kestrel as the web server and configure it using the application's configuration providers, set the to the result of , load from 'appsettings.json' and 'appsettings.[].json', load from User Secrets when is 'Development' using the entry assembly, load from environment variables, load from supplied command line args, configure the to log to the console and debug output, enable IIS integration.
